work.company: Rashtriya Chemicals and Fertilizers Ltd, India
work.title: Web Development Project Intern
description: Designed a grievance monitoring web portal for their official website where employees or non-employees can submit their grievances which are then sent to the respective authority in-charge.
Implemented HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript for front-end and C# in ASP.NET framework for back-end.
Oversaw the entire user database using Oracle SQL in Toad GUI and imported the authority information from the company database.
Was praised by the RCF leadership for quick database querying abilities and dedication towards work.
